daily_summary.headline: SpaceX Dominates with Multiple Starlink Launches

top_events.title: Falcon 9 Block 5 | Starlink Group 17-13
top_events.description: SpaceX launches another batch of Starlink satellites, continuing to expand their global internet coverage.
top_events.action: Watch the live stream for real-time updates.

top_events.title: Aurora Viewing Opportunity
top_events.description: Moderate geomagnetic activity expected, offering potential aurora sightings at high latitudes.
top_events.action: Check the skies if you're in northern regions.

top_events.title: Firefly Alpha | Stairway to Seven
top_events.description: Firefly Aerospace's test flight to validate key systems after previous launch failure.
top_events.action: Follow updates for insights into Firefly's progress.

opportunities.recommendation: Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
